SELECT sar.id, sar.CODE, sar.supplier_id, sar.content, sar.STATUS, sar.create_date, sar.audit_date, sar.del_flag,
si.CODE AS supplierCode, si.NAME AS supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images AS supplierImages, FROM supplier_audit_record sar LEFT JOIN supplier_info si ON (si.id = sar.supplier_id) WHERE 1 = 1
AND sar.CODE like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.code},"%")
AND sar.STATUS = #{queryForm.status}
AND si.NAME like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
ORDER BY sar.create_date DESC
